**City Council Meetings:**
--------------------------

* ### **3rd Tuesday of each month at** **6:00 p.m.**
* ### **Hollywood Park Town Hall 2 Mecca Drive Hollywood Park, Texas**

**City Council:**
-----------------

**![](https://hollywoodpark-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Chester-mayor-pic-285x300.jpg)****Mayor – Chester Drash**  
email: [cdrash@hollywoodpark-tx.gov](mailto:cdrash@hollywoodpark-tx.gov)  
phone: 210-452-7855  
Term ends:  May 2026

**Council Place 1 – Jim Rodriguez**  
email:  [jimrodriguez@hollywoodpark-tx.gov](mailto:jimrodriguez@hollywoodpark-tx.gov)  
phone: 210-792-3899  
Term ends: May 2027
